description: You can't argue with comfort and classic nature of the crew sweatshirt, and the Logo Pullover Crew is our take on the undeniable cool-weather staple. Made with a soft and fleecy cotton, this top is just the ticket for keeping it casual when cool weather moves in.
name: Mountain Hardwear MHW Logo Pullover Crew - Mens

specs.value: Solid 250gm Cotton, Polyester Fleece - 69% Cotton, 17% Polyester, 14% Recycled Polyester
